pullrequest.title: Option I - Fix ABI in gazebo_2.2 branch. Hack of reusing a non used member instead on initialized

content.raw:
The link to the ABI checker is not really testing this branch, note the suffix _megahack in this pull request.

I've starting a [new ABI job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-current-any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/6/) against the gazebo-current package.
content.html:
The link to the ABI checker is not really testing this branch, note the suffix _megahack in this pull request.
